evidence.text:
JASPER: ...I'm tellin' ya, I just don't think it's the best use of my skills.
SERGEANT HANK: Just remember, Jasper, if it weren't for the police union, you wouldn't even have a job right now.
JASPER: Understood, but now that I am back, I should have my job back.
JASPER: At least I'm trained for it.
SERGEANT HANK: Maybe you hadn't heard since you were on suspension, but Gary's done a great job. His conviction rate is higher, and frankly, he's got a better range than you do.

JASPER: Well, shit. Why don't you just have me clean the toilets around here, Sarge? I can do that!
SERGEANT HANK: Since you're being the asshole, I'll just come right out and say it: we're trying to hide your face, okay?
